protocol.name: P-GSE20955-2
protocol.text: 5 µM dexamethasone (DEX) and 10 µM cycloheximide (CHX) for 6 hours in phosphate-lacking Johnson liquid medium.

protocol.name: P-GSE20955-3
protocol.text: Plants were grown for 7 days in liquid Johnson medium containing 2% sucrose and 2mM phosphate (KH2PO4), 2 days in phosphate-lacking medium (-Pi) and then supplemented with 5 µM dexamethasone (DEX) and 10 µM cycloheximide (CHX) for 6 hours before harvesting.

protocol.name: P-GSE20955-4
protocol.text: The RNA from complete plants was isolated using RNeasy plant mini kit from Quiagen

protocol.name: P-GSE20955-5
protocol.text: Each RNA preparation was tested for degradation using the Agilent 2100 Bioanalyzer (Agilent technologies, Palo Alto, CA). cDNA was synthesized from 4 µg of total RNA using One-cycle target labeling and control reagents(Affymetrix, Santa Clara, CA) to produce biotin-labeled cRNA. The cRNA preparations (15 µg) were fragmented at 94ºC for 35 min into 35-200 bases in length.

protocol.name: P-GSE20955-6
protocol.text: 10µg of fragmented cRNA were hybridized to the Arabidopsis ATH1 Genome array (Affymetrix, SantaClara, CA), containing 22500 transcript variants from 24000 well -characterized Arabidopsis thaliana genes. Each sample was added to a hybridization solution containing 100mM2-(N-morpholino) ethanesulfonic acid, 1M Na+,and 20mM of EDTA in the presence of 0.01% of Tween-20 to a final cRNA concentration of 0.05µg/ml. Hybridization was performed for 16 h at 45ºC . Each microarray was washed and stained with streptavidin-phycoerythrin in a Fluidics station 450 (Affymetrix)

protocol.name: P-GSE20955-7
protocol.text: Each microarray was scanned at 2.5 µm resolution in a GeneChip® Scanner 3000 7G System (Affymetrix)

protocol.name: P-GSE20955-8
protocol.text: Analysis was performed using the affylmaGUI R package (Wettenhall et al, 2006). Robust Muti-array Analysis (RMA) algorithm was used for background correction, normalization and expression levels summarization (Irizarry et al., 2003).
